tool_description: Designed to provide users with the ability to search for and locate electric vehicle charging stations. The API includes a vast database of over 50,000 charging stations, with more being added regularly.
name: Electric Vehicle Charging Stations
title: Electric Vehicle Charging Stations

api_list.name: GetByCordsAdv
api_list.description: Uses Latitude & Longitude to get near by electric charging stations

api_list.name: GetAccessType
api_list.description: Returns access type options for stations
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://electric-vehicle-charging-stations.p.rapidapi.com/getAccessTypes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "electric-vehicle-charging-stations.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetEVConnectors
api_list.description: Return only electric charging connector types that can be used to filter GetByCordsAdv.
api_list.code:

api_list.name: GetOwners
api_list.description: Return stations owned by the given types of owners. A single owner type, or a comma-separated list of multiple owner types, may be given.
api_list.code:

url = "https://electric-vehicle-charging-stations.p.rapidapi.com/getOwners"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "electric-vehicle-charging-stations.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetNetworks
api_list.description: Return only electric charging stations that belong to the given network. A single network, or a comma separated list of multiple networks, may be given.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://electric-vehicle-charging-stations.p.rapidapi.com/getNetworks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "electric-vehicle-charging-stations.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
